name: ticker
descriptions: the ticker is an animated array of links defined in html and repositioned dynamically with javascript

name: connect4
descriptions: the evergreen game goes online. fight the circular dogs to win

name: panes
descriptions: the panes are images controlled through eventhandling and mousemovement

name: spotify
descriptions: the spotify search bar allows you to use the spotify api available through elegant croissant to search your favorite artists

name: carousel
descriptions: ever wondered how to build a galery of rotating pics?
